summary: HD reskins of all Elven equipment in the game to have a black and gold colour scheme, not unlike that of the Thalmor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#0099FF][size=24][b]Dark Elven Equipment - by Flobulon[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=4][color=#00CCFF][b]New - a standalone version by matortheeternal is available [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33223/]>>HERE<<[/url]![/b][/color][/size][/center]
A HD reskin of all elven equipment in the game, with a black and gold-leaf colour scheme. 
Normal maps have been remastered to provide greater detail. 
All textures are double the vanilla resolution - please contact me if your computer cannot handle these resolutions 
and I will provide alternative files at the original resolutions. Enjoy!

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size]
Copy the \"Data\" folder into your Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim folder. Say yes to any prompts about merging folders. Feel free to copy only some files if you wish to only use some of the textures (e.g. to change only the daggers, copy only the data/textures/weapons/elven/dagger folder).

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color][/size]
Delete the following files from your Data folder:

	- textures\\armor\\elven\\f\\cuirass.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\f\\cuirass_n.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\boots_d.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\boots_n.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\cuirass.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\cuirass_n.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\gauntlets_d.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\gauntlets_n.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\helmet_d.dds
	- textures\\armor\\elven\\m\\helmet_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\arrow\\quiver.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\arrow\\quiver_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\battleaxe\\elvenbattleaxe.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\battleaxe\\elvenbattleaxe_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\bow\\bow.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\bow\\bow_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\dagger\\dagger_d.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\dagger\\dagger_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\greatsword\\greatsword_d.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\greatsword\\greatsword_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\handaxe\\handaxe.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\handaxe\\handaxe_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\mace\\mace.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\mace\\mace_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\scabbard\\scabbard.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\scabbard\\scabbard_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\shield\\shield_d.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\shield\\shield_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\sword\\sword_d.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\sword\\sword_n.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\warhammer\\elvenwarhammer.dds
	- textures\\weapons\\elven\\warhammer\\elvenwarhammer_n.dds

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b] Version History[/b][/color][/size]

19/11/11 - 1.0 - First release
22/11/11 - 1.1 - Compressed diffuse textures using DXT1, should be no loss of quality for a better filesize

	
[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Contact[/b][/color][/size]
Contact the creator of this mod, Flobulon, on www.skyrimnexus.com or www.thenexusforums.com.
author: Flobulon
